Rna seq (#167)

Added an rna-seq pipeline

* Added gene count matix generation

* Added differential expression analysis to the rna-seq workflow

* Improved STAR-alignment

* Implemented conversion for salmon output to gene counts matrix using tximeta. Only works with Ensembl genomes currently.

* added Jenkins tests for the RNA-seq workflow

* added bam to bigwig generation.

still to do: support of assembly hubs

default samples for testing

* Updated Jenkins. Will only run test for which we have proper test samples

* fixed bwa running twice in test

* added bam to bigwig generation.
bams are split by strandedness if strandedness is given in samples.tsv.
also switched all instances of sample-assembly to assembly-sample for improved file sorting.
added wildcard constraints to all paths with multiple wildcards in a row, such as {{assembly}}-{{sample}}.

* typos & minor fixes

* replaced individual wildcard constraints with global ones for both assembly and sample.

undid indexing outputting files rather than folders
